; === CARGA DE DATOS ===
0b00011000
0b00000101
0b10111000
0b00100000
0b00110000
0b00011000
0b00000010
0b10111000
0b00100001
0b00110000

; === INICIO ===
0b00011000
0b00000000
0b10111000
0b00100010
0b00110000
0b10111000
0b00100001
0b00100000
0b10111000
0b00100011
0b00110000
0b10111000
0b00100000
0b00100000
0b10111000
0b00100110
0b00110000
0b00011000
0b00000000
0b10111000
0b00100100
0b00110000
0b00011000
0b00001000
0b10111000
0b00100101
0b00110000

0b00100000

0b00101000

; === ZERO ===
0b10111000
0b00100100
0b00100000
0b01011000
0b00101000

0b00101000

; === DO_SUB ===
0b01110000
0b01000101
0b01010000
0b00101000

; === SHIFT ===

0b01010011
0b00011000
0b00000001
0b00111000

0b10111000

0b00100000

0b00110000
0b11000000
0b00010010
0b01010000
0b00110111

; === DONE ===
